item.title: Prolog and Natural-Language Analysis
item.description: Book in question Prolog and Natural-Language Analysis by Fernando C. N. Pereira and Stuart M. Shieber Review This book has been interesting so far. On reading the 1st chapter, I discovered how to build Semantic Networks in prolog. On reading the 2nd chapter I realised I would like to make a NL parser in prolog. It would a fast way to explore building my own programmatic (as opposed to transformer-based) NL parser.
